text: Achiika! Ninvuɣu shεba ban ti Naawuni yεlimaŋli (Muslinnima), ni Yahuudunima, ni ban jεmdi saŋmarsi bee Malaaikanima, ni Nashaaranima (dolodolonima), ni Majuusinima (ban jεmdi buɣum), n-ti pahi ban bo nyintahi n-ti Naawuni, achiika! Naawuni ni ti niŋ fukumsi bɛ sunsuuni Zaadali. Achiika! Naawuni nyɛla Ŋun diri binshɛɣu kam shɛhira
